_header: O sweet angel to me so dear
_description: ‘A praier to the goode Angell’ — twenty lines: 3 x 6, aabccb, plus final couplet

HunEL34B7.First Lines:
O swete angell to me soo deerethat nyght and day standithe me
                    neere…
HunEL34B7.Last Lines:
…O swete Angell that keepithe meBryng me to blysse I pray
                    the
HunEL34B7.Attributed Title: A praier to the goode Angell (f. 81)
